results.headline: ROMERO (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Romero

results.summary_short: Earnest biodrama about liberal, slain San Salvador archbishop. Scores as simplified tale of heroic man rather than cinema. Not very moving.
